## Consider organising the repair work yourself ##

If the problem is relatively small, you could arrange for the repairs to be done. However, it's important to keep your landlord informed, and follow a step-by-step process. You must not stop paying rent without notice, but you may be able to take the cost of repairs out of your rent. 

See more about organising repairs yourself: [https://england.shelter.org.uk/housing_advice/repairs/doing_the_repairs_if_your_landlord_wont](https://england.shelter.org.uk/housing_advice/repairs/doing_the_repairs_if_your_landlord_wont)
